    • Method Detail

      • expandExternal

        public void expandExternal(INode<T> n,
                           T e)
        Expand an external node - Store a value in the external node - Create two external nodes as children, making n an internal node
        Parameters:
        n - The node to expand. An exception will be thrown if it is not external.
        e - The value to be stored in node n.

      • remove
